channel.title: Chris Webb MP (Bluesky) on News Lancashire
channel.description: Recent content in Chris Webb MP (Bluesky) on News Lancashire

item.title: 2025 has been a year of making a real difference for people across Blackpool South. As we welcome the New Year, here are...
item.description: 2025 has been a year of making a real difference for people across Blackpool South. As we welcome the New Year, here are the ten moments that defined the past twelve months for me : www.chriswebb.org/news/a-year-of-progress-my-top-10-moments-of-2025 Source: Chris Webb MP (Bluesky)

item.title: Blackpool and The Fylde College offers excellent courses that equip young people with the skills to work with the vital...
item.description: Blackpool and The Fylde College offers excellent courses that equip young people with the skills to work with the vital renewable energy equipment we need for the future. I asked the Secretary of State to meet me to discuss how we can create those jobs right here in Blackpool?

item.title: Blackpool faces serious housing shortages. While the Council has made real progress in building new homes, there is stil...
item.description: Blackpool faces serious housing shortages. While the Council has made real progress in building new homes, there is still more to be done. I asked the Secretary of State what can be done so that we can build the social housing we desperately need & meet the Â£1.

item.title: Last week, I met with the Exchequer Secretary to the Treasury, Dan Tomlinson MP, to press the case for stronger support...
item.description: Last week, I met with the Exchequer Secretary to the Treasury, Dan Tomlinson MP, to press the case for stronger support for our hospitality businesses and local pubs. Source: Chris Webb MP (Bluesky)

item.title: Looking back at December in Parliament âª This is what bringing Blackpool into Parliament looks like â€“ raising real issu...
item.description: Looking back at December in Parliament âª This is what bringing Blackpool into Parliament looks like â€“ raising real issues and pushing for the change we need. ğŸ“º youtu.be/fF6nA9gWdNc Source: Chris Webb MP (Bluesky)

item.title: Not only are waiting lists falling, but ambulances are arriving faster, and patient satisfaction with GP access has incr...
item.description: Not only are waiting lists falling, but ambulances are arriving faster, and patient satisfaction with GP access has increased from 60% to 75%. Fewer staff are leaving than at any point in the past decade, outside of the pandemic. All this despite a really challenging winter.

item.title: This month in my role as chair for the APPG for Hospitality and Tourism I welcomed the Minister for Tourism, Stephanie P...
item.description: This month in my role as chair for the APPG for Hospitality and Tourism I welcomed the Minister for Tourism, Stephanie Peacock MP (left) to speak with MPs from across the House and industry representative including Kate Nicholls, chair of UKHospitality (right).

item.description: Wishing everyone a very Happy New Year! ğŸ‰ As we head into 2026, Iâ€™ll keep working to make sure Blackpoolâ€™s voice is heard, locally and in Parliament, and to speak up on the issues that matter most to people here. Hereâ€™s to building a better Blackpool.
